00007         class ContactEmail
00008         {
00009                 const default_subject = 'Messaggio dal sito Emeraldion.it da parte di ';
00010                 const default_recipient = 'claudio@emeraldion.it';
00011                 
00016                 public $name;
00017                 
00022                 public $URL;
00023                 
00028                 public $email;
00029                 
00034                 public $subject;
00035                 
00040                 public $recipient;
00041                 
00046                 public $text;
00047                 
00052                 public $headers;
00053                 
00059                 public function ContactEmail($params)
00060                 {
00061                         $this->name = $params['name'];
00062                         $this->email = $params['email'];
00063                         $this->subject = !empty($params['subject']) ?
00064                                 $params['subject'] : (self::default_subject . $params['name']);
00065                         $this->URL = $params['URL'];
00066                         $this->recipient = self::default_recipient;
00067                         $this->headers = "From: {$params['name']}<{$params['email']}>";
00068                         $this->text = get_magic_quotes_gpc() ? stripslashes($params['text']) : $params['text'];
00069                         $this->date = date("d/m/Y H:i:s");
00070                 }
00071                 
00076                 public function send()
00077                 {
00078                         mail($this->recipient,
00079                                 $this->subject,
00080                                 $this->make_text(),
00081                                 $this->headers);
00082                 }
00083                 
00088                 public function make_text()
00089                 {
00090                         return <<<EOT
00091 Da: {$this->name}
00092 Email: {$this->email}
00093 URL: {$this->URL}
00094 IP: {$_SERVER['REMOTE_ADDR']}
00095 User Agent: {$_SERVER['HTTP_USER_AGENT']}
00096 Data: {$this->date}
00097 
00098 {$this->text}
00099 
00100 -- 
00101 Emeraldion Lodge
00102 http://www.emeraldion.it
00103 
00104 EOT;
00105                 }
00106         }
